page.title: 12 EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA.
page.content: Of the working population,the majority commute to work in Budleigh Salterton 2.5km to the south,Exmouth 7.5km to the S.W or Exeter about 17km to the N.W.Most travel by car,especially as Public Transport services have declined over the years,and most work in the Tertiary sector,in shops and offices. Rolle College in Exmouth, Bicton College of Agriculture and Exeter University provide employment in education in the East Devon area. Seasonal incomes are obtained from tourist services such as cream-teas. Bicton Gardens and Otterton Mill. These service industries have provided employment to replace jobs lost with increased mechanisation in agriculture and have been of additional importance when one considers the small manufacturing base in the area. By A.Kain & J.Ross
